article_title: US confirms first aid trucks arrive via Gaza pier
sentence: The  Israeli  offensive  began  after  Hamas  gunmen  burst  into  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  252  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.
